trans-unit.source: Contains information about the workflow instance associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The runtime tracking infrastructure passes a TrackingParameters object in when it calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> on a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.
You can use these parameters in your tracking service to associate tracking data received on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> with a specific workflow instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters"></xref> class.
The constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The root <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

A list of strings, each of which represents the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of an activity in the call chain of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel. Currently, only the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity that invoked the workflow instance is included in the list.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow that has called the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
A number that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the root activity of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
A number that identifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the activity that invoked the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

A number that identifies the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> of the activity that invoked the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Gets the context ID of the caller activity.
A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the caller <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that called the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that called the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Gets the context ID of the caller's parent activity.
A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the caller's parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

Gets a list of strings, each of which represents the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of an activity in the call chain of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Currently, only the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> of the activity that invoked the workflow instance is included in the list.

A list of strings, each of which represents the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of an activity in the call chain of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Gets the context ID of the associated activity.
A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Gets the root activity of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
